title: Create Internal Training Material
description: An agent must create training material for new analysts on how to perform a SWOT analysis.

tasks.description: Draft a section explaining what a SWOT analysis is and why it is used.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear and accurate definition.

tasks.description: Create a simple, fictional example of a SWOT analysis for a well-known company (e.g., Coca-Cola).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a clear and illustrative example.

tasks.description: Draft a list of 'Do's and Don'ts' for conducting a good SWOT analysis.
